name: The Storyteller
description:
Game created for the Fall 2022 Budding Game Devs Buddy Up Jam. The theme was Legend. 

  • Design - Réjean Lagassé
  • Programming - Réjean Lagassé
  • Writing - Réjean Lagassé and K-Lexis Blaze
  • Original Game Concept - Réjean Lagassé and CaptainKapp
  • Art acquired from free use images on Shutterstock and weathered by Réjean
    • Stock Photo and Image Portfolio by buchandbee | Shutterstock
    • Stock Photo and Image Portfolio by ULKASTUDIO | Shutterstock

How to play

Select options with the mouse. Purchase buildings from the "Legend" tab. View town stats in the "town" tab. If you have purchased everything you wish to purchase, click next turn. After 5 turns, the game is over and your ending is decided.
